original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge down in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s mid day shares edged down on Monday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was down 0.25 percent or 22.29 points to 8,905.45, while the most liquid index S&P SL20 was down 0.68 percent or 17.72 points to 2,570.17.
Top losers at 12oo hours were Sampath Bank, Commercial Bank and People’s Insurance. (Colombo/May15/2023)
